title: Nice Hotel in the center
text: Nice hotel in the center of Athens , pretty close to the Temple of Zeus and National Park as well as Acropolis Museum . Good service , nice pool area and conference room . Pretty convinient for business trips also

title: Palatine Hill
text: Rome is so full of sites and ancient monuments to see , that you have to walk all day for all the days you LL stay there ! Palatine Hill is one of the areas you must visit as there are many nice things for shooting pictures and in a way different landscape than other locations

title: Fontana do Trevi
text: A must see when you visit Rome , it's always full of people day or night ! The sculptures are awesome and the when complex of the monument and fountain keeps you there !!!

title: Superb for coffee
text: It's the idealmplace to have a relaxed coffee in this beautiful piazza where you can meet street artists and a lot of tourists of course . Do enjoy a perfect cappuccino and a tiramissu you ll never forget !!

title: Coloseum
text: Maybe the absolute site to visit in Rome, must get ticket early otherwise you'll have to stand long in the queue waiting as always there is so much people there to see itm totally impressive and a must !!!

title: Super Roman food
text: A beautiful restaurant with typical Roman food and very nice atmosphere. Deserves to try !!! Carbonara was perfect so was amatricciana and steak !

title: Best
text: Maybe the best carbonara I ever had !! Very good restaurant normal prices ! Must go of you visit Rome

title: SUPER
text: Excellent location, very good staff, superb breakfast , professional transfer and tour services , the best chyoice in all !!! Your first pick upon visitng Athens , very close to the center and Acropolis but very quite and relaxing

title: Top quality service, security , performance
text: Top Quality service very good plane and trained peronnel, always on time , good care during the flighth

title: Nice experience
text: Perfectly located is a nice experience for coffe or drink with meze break during your Athens tour and in spring is really awsome !

title: A Must See !
text: The absolute must see in Greece !!! The ancient Greece creation that is well known allover the world and is the first point of visit for every first timer in Greece !
